title: How to pickle jalapenos by jessyratfink Download5 Steps
directions: Slice the jalape単os into rounds as thin as you like, I normally do 1/4 inch. Test the jalape単os and remove the seeds and membranes if you think they'll be too spicy for you - this is your chance to make it as spicy as you like! You could also throw in a habanero (pierced with a knife) or some serranos to increase the heat.
Slice the carrots as well - if you like them softer, go thinner than 1/4 inch.
Slice the onion thinly, and crush the garlic cloves and remove the skins.
Now you'll want to combine the water, vinegar, oregano, peppercorns, bay leaf, garlic, salt and sugar in a microwave-safe measuring cup.
ingredients: 6-10 jalape単o peppers (this will all depend on the size of the jalape単os - start with six and work your way up!)
2 cloves garlic, peeled and lightly crushed
1-2 tablespoons salt (start with 1 tablespoon, 2 is pretty dang salty.)
a few black peppercorns, lightly crushed
